definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Yes, they got divorced, for his wife was unstable as water.
sentences.chinese: 是的，他們離婚了，因爲他的妻子水性楊花。

sentences.english: He has been uneasy with this woman's skittish.
sentences.chinese: 他一直都介意這個女人的水性楊花。

sentences.english: You are a lady of easy virtue.
sentences.chinese: 你是個水性楊花的女人。

sentences.english: The history, as we know, it is both of easy virtue and ruthlessness.
sentences.chinese: 歷史，我們知道，它水性楊花又冷酷無情。

sentences.english: She says the programme portrayed her as a "lady of easy virtue ".
sentences.chinese: 她說這個節目把她刻畫成了一個“水性楊花的女人”。

sentences.english: Scene of debauchery achievement man of ambition, wanton make significant woman style.
sentences.chinese: 燈紅酒綠成就男人雄心，水性楊花顯盡女人風情。

sentences.english: She should be a skittish woman.
sentences.chinese: 她應該是一個水性楊花的女人。

definition: to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
